meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being a soldier.
meanings.sent1: His soldierships was evident in the way he stood tall and saluted.
meanings.sent2: The soldierships of the brave men and women was commendable.
meanings.sent3: The soldierships of the young cadet was tested during the obstacle course.
meanings.sent4: In times of crisis, the soldierships of the nation shines through.
meanings.sent5: The soldierships of the general inspired his troops to victory.

meanings.definition: The skill or practice of military activities.
